parameters.name: AggregationInterval
parameters.description:
The data aggregation interval. Unit: seconds.

Valid values: 1, 10, 60, 600, and 3600.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: AggregationType
parameters.description:
The data aggregation type. Valid values:

*   sum: the sum of the data
*   avg: the average value
*   max: the maximum value
*   min: the minimum value

Aggregation is disabled by default.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description:
The filter conditions. A JSON-formatted string that contains several key-value pairs. Valid values of the key:

*   InstanceId: the ID of the node
*   Hostname: the hostname of the node
*   NetworkInterface: the name of the network interface
*   DiskDevice: the name of the disk

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The time is a timestamp. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of seconds that have elapsed since the epoch time January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: MetricCategories
parameters.description:
The category of the output performance metrics. Separate multiple metrics with commas (,). Valid values:

*   cpu
*   memory

parameters.name: MetricScope
parameters.description:
The dimensions of the performance metric. Valid values:

*   machine
*   process
*   network
*   disk

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return logs in reverse order of timestamps. Default value: false.

parameters.name: To
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The time is a timestamp. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of seconds that have elapsed since the epoch time January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
